trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> to stop executing and returns control back to the calling method.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> interrompa a execução e retorna o controle volta para o método de chamada.

trans-unit.source: The Halt action is similar to a break command, although it ends the execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.
trans-unit.target: A ação Halt é semelhante a um comando de interrupção, embora ele termina a execução do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>.

trans-unit.source: The Halt action will stop execution of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> when all the actions in the same action block have finished executing.
trans-unit.target: A ação Halt parará a execução do <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> quando todas as ações no mesmo bloco de ação concluiu a execução.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia em profundidade do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> que é idêntico a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser comparado com o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de objeto são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os objetos forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> context used to execute the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> usado para executar o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" />.
trans-unit.target: Executa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" /> usando o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExecution" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> para gerenciar o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: Returns the fields and properties updated by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna os campos e propriedades atualizadas pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: A list of the fields and properties changed by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista dos campos e propriedades alteradas pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Since <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction" /> does not have parameters, the return value will always be an empty list.
trans-unit.target: Já que <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleHaltAction" /> não tem parâmetros, o valor retornado é sempre uma lista vazia.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string "Halt".
trans-unit.target: Retorna a cadeia de caracteres "Halt".

trans-unit.source: The string "Halt".
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres "Halt".

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> para gerenciar o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: Returns true, no validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Retorna true, nenhuma validação é executada.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <see langword="true" />.
